text: Kogane is energetic from the morning, huh-

Hehe~
Ah had a hearty breakfast, ya know!

Oh, good for you.
I had a solid meal today too.

Wow... Producer-san...
What did ya have fer breakfast today...?

I bought onigiri from the
convenience store this morning.

Nice~! Rice is the source of power, ya know!
What flavor did ya choose~?

Hehe... freshly baked toast...
It's the smell of the mornin', ya know...

That's right.
If it comes with coffee, then I'm all in.

You just need to pour some milk over it.
It's convenient to eat quickly.

I get it~  Don't wanna go
through the hassle in the mornin', right~?
